welcome_message_body: Welcome to Durban, the city known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Surf Riders
restaurants.description: Surf Riders is a bistro located in the city.

restaurants.description: Ciao Bella Café is a café located in Point Waterfront.
